attributes.action: Stop using taxpayers money for foreign  aid. When it could be used by the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
in excess of 1 billion of our money needs to stay in the UK, this amount is getting larger every year ...STOP NOW 

http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/636609/Foreign-aid-spending-TREBLES-as-watchdog-warns-there-could-be-NO-END-to-Britain-s-largesse?_ga=1.15050676.322070449.1459769090
attributes.background: We as a nation have always been generous but we have to know when the British taxpayers money could be best used elsewhere. We have a struggling NHS, homeless veterans and schools struggling for cash to name a few. Stop sending out money overseas and use it in the UK, Listen to the people.
